properties.description: Master package that starts a job and triggers child execution pipelines. Specify a job name or leave it set to "default". Every task belongs to the "default" job, so this would trigger every task to be executed. To only execute specific tasks, create a job in etl.Job and map the tasks in etl.TaskJobBridge

activities.name: GetTaskWorklist
activities.description: Get the list of tasks that need to be completed during this job run

activities.name: Foreach_TaskAuditKey
activities.description: The output of the previous activity should be a list of tasks to complete. Lookup through them, marking the task as started and then executing the work.

activities.name: TaskAuditFailure
activities.description: Normally errors within the prior pipeline should get caught within that same pipeline. In case of catastrophic error, however, catch any errors here and make sure to mark the TaskAudit row as failed.

properties.description:
Performs the data ingestion from the source system. Optionally loads several other areas of the data lake.

Data can either be ingested into a transient landing area or directly into the persisted raw area.

It can also optionally be loaded into the curated area.

activities.name: ingest_from_source
activities.description: based on the type of source DB, execute the proper "Copy Data" activity. This is not parameterized because the sink for a "Copy Data" activity cannot be parameterized. Execute the SetLimitAuditInfo stored proc both before and after the Copy Data activity. If this is not an incremental ADFActionKey, then this stored proc will do nothing.

activities.name: Set_LoadRawFromLandingZone
activities.description: This boolean variable controls whether the package will attempt to first load a landing zone and then subsequently copy the data into the persisted raw area

activities.name: Set_DataLakeInitialContainer
activities.description: This variable holds the name of the container that the data will be first placed within the data lake (either transient landing area or persisted raw)

activities.name: Set_DataLakeInitialFolder
activities.description: This variable holds the name of the folder that the data will be first placed within the data lake (either transient landing area or persisted raw)

activities.name: Set_DataLakeInitialFileName
activities.description: This variable holds the name of the filename that the data will be first placed within the data lake (either transient landing area or persisted raw)

activities.name: Set_DataLakeInitialFileCompression
activities.description: This variable holds the name of the flie compression that we will use when the data is first placed within the data lake (either transient landing area or persisted raw)

activities.name: Set_LoadLandingArea
activities.description: Sets the variable that determines whether data first hits a transient landing area or if it goes straight into a persisted raw area

activities.name: If_LandingAreaToRaw_Enabled
activities.description: If both the Landing Area and Persisted Raw locations have been specified, then immediately copy this data that was just landed into the raw area

activities.name: ExecuteTaskPipeline
activities.description: Execute either the "Standard" task pipeline or if this is an "advanced" task, then execute the pipeline that corresponds to the AdvancedConfigName assigned to the ConfigName variable

activities.name: TaskAuditFailure
activities.description: If the pipeline registered an error, then mark this TaskAudit row as failed

activities.name: TaskAuditSuccess
activities.description: If the pipeline finished successfully, then mark this TaskAudit row as successfully complete
